about_the_game:
WELCOME TO PANDEI

Welcome to Pandei. Pandei is an Alpha Universe whose roots control all Multiverse and move from one to another, but only the Gods of the Alpha Universe have this ability.

GODS

There are a total of 7 Gods in Pandei, Amareinte, God of Justice and Great Sinner, Amandine, God of Order, Lucius, God of Fate, Korvak, God of Retribution, Axel, God of Good, Eternitas, God of Eternity.

GAMEPLAY

Take control of the strongest of the 7 Gods, the God of Justice Amareinte. She is a Great Sinner who broke all the Heavenly Laws, created life, Chromium, which became a great discovery that changed the fate of the planet. Control different creatures, summon powerful creatures that she made. Dissolve your enemies. Destroy the obstacles in your path. Use the powers of different Deities.

FEATURES

  • Unique OST

  • Interesting story

  • Eye-pleasing locations

  • Use Chromium in battles, exploring levels, solving puzzles and much more!

  • Explore Pandei and Dead Realms

  • Create objects from Chromium

short_description: Divine Justice is a linear action game, where you play as a God of Justice Amareinte. Explore Buried Realms, explore the Pandei. Rebuild the Alphaverse, rebuild the Multiverses.
